Package com.sleepycat.bdb.bind

Interfaces for defining data formats and data-to-object bindings [reference guide]

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
DataBinding The interface implemented by all data-to-object bindings.
DataBuffer The interface used in bindings to access the data as a byte array.
DataFormat The tag interface implemented by all data formats.
DataType Primitive data type constants.
EntityBinding The interface implemented by all entity or key/data-to-object bindings.
KeyExtractor The interface implemented for extracting the index key from primary key and/or value buffers, and for clearing the index key in a value buffer.
 

Class Summary
ByteArrayBinding A transparent binding where the data byte array is used as the object.
ByteArrayFormat The format for data stored as a byte array.
SimpleBuffer A simple data buffer implementation that allows using bindings for arbitrary data outside the context of a database.
 

Package com.sleepycat.bdb.bind Description

Interfaces for defining data formats and data-to-object bindings [reference guide]
